website_summaries.verdict: Although a pair of ELITE Thermal Knee Warmers is a bit of an investment, active cyclists will feel cozy, warm, and dry, even on the dreariest and wettest of days.
pros: Allows for a wide range of motion
cons: These active leg warmers are on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: They don't slip
customer_reviews.text: I've been on one 25 mile with these so far. My big concern was that they would slip down while riding, and so far that hasn't been true. I bought one size smaller than the size chart suggested, and they fit snugly but don't restrict my motion or circulation. I wore them under my bib shorts. They kept me warm in 43 degree weather, and they stayed put. They met all the criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great down to about 35-40 degrees F
customer_reviews.text: They fit me really well, are well made, and have a nice soft fleece lining. I have worn them (with bib shorts) out in the 35-40 degree F range and they kept me warm. Expensive, but they are good quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative to full tights.  Works great
customer_reviews.text: 5'10 and skinny, ordered according to measurements and chart. Fit perfectly under my normal cycling shorts. Have rode in upper 20s and low 30s F degree weather and they worked perfectly. Also bought pearls arm warmers and off brand balaclava. With this setup I am completely comfortable on a bike, only need to get better gloves and shoe covers now as my fingers and toes get uncomfortably cold.
customer_reviews.author: Newrider

customer_reviews.title: 100% do what they need to do...
customer_reviews.text: These are magic - warm when it's cold, no slipping and easily removable when the weather hots up...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: have good grip around the thighs and have a short zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and get these! They are tapered, have good grip around the thighs and have a short zipper at the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisD

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm but don't stay up on your legs. You have to stop and pull them up.
customer_reviews.author: GVI Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Warm! Stays up even during running!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and stays up really well. Bought to use during my 100 mile running race for easy changes during cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Molitor

customer_reviews.title: Warm ride
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and comfort. I hate being cold and these legwarmers serve very well and stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, keep my legs warm and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Stenehjem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 6’, 190lbs... Large fit perfect. Great quality, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rader

customer_reviews.title: not just cool ones.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend. They fit well and don't slip. More for COLD days, not just cool ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Parris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm & they don't slip off my legs. Buy one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Brettrager

customer_reviews.title: They were very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family member to wear under a whole leg brace. They were very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Madi R.

customer_reviews.title: husband loves them.
customer_reviews.text: They have come in handy. When he has them on, it almost looks like he has tights on. I would buy them again for him.
customer_reviews.author: kkezir
